Method.name: ConvertUnixTimeToHorolog
Method.Implementation: set date = $normalize(unixTime / 86400, -1) + 47117 // get integer days part and adjust to Cache time set time = unixTime - ..ConvertHorologToUnixTime(date, 0) // get remaining time in day in seconds
